subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre set a Green Bay record with 20 consecutive completions and finished with a season-high 381 yards and 3 touchdowns in the Packers’ 37-26 victory against the Lions yesterday in Detroit.
snippet: Brett Favre set a Green Bay record with 20 consecutive completions and finished with a season-high 381 yards and 3 touchdowns in the Packers’ 37-26 victory against the Lions yesterday in Detroit.
